<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://www.westair.com/]]>
Improve your pilot’s vision and add instant value to your aircraft with the installation of Honeywell’s new DU-875 liquid crystal display (LCD) screens.
Replace one or all of your old CRT DU-870 displays and receive the many benefits that come with this easy and inexpensive update:
- Reduction of ownership’s cost - Greater reliability of screen display - Reduced weight - Maintains the complete integration of the cabin - 12-month screen warranty - Growth plan that takes advantage of future technologies and applications - Special bonus for entry into the HAPP program: First year free! Discount of US $10,000 in the 2nd and 3rd years of the program *
Avoid obsolescence and save up to US $ 200,000 ** by taking advantage of this limited-time screen exchange promotion. Contact Western Aircraft today to learn more about the update of the DU-875 display for Falcon 900EX/900C and Embraer Legacy 600/650 aircraft.
UPDATE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/WesternAircraft_DU-875.html]]>
* Valid only for the replacement of all screens at one time. ** Savings are based on the upgrade of up to five (5) DU-870 LCD screens on Falcon 900EX aircraft. Ask us to about the savings for your aircraft model.
